mapper.select: SELECT OPERATOR_ID, NAME, JOB_NO, WORK_COUNT_FLG, SECTION_ID, LINE_ID, ROLE_ID, POSITION_ID, EMAIL, PX, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME, DELETE_FLG FROM OPERATOR WHERE OPERATOR_ID = #{operator_id};
SELECT OPERATOR_ID, NAME, JOB_NO, WORK_COUNT_FLG, SECTION_NAME, LINE_NAME, ROLE_NAME, EMAIL, PX, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME FROM V_OPERATOR_NAMED WHERE DELETE_FLG = 0 AND OPERATOR_ID = #{operator_id};

SELECT OPERATOR_ID, NAME, JOB_NO, WORK_COUNT_FLG, SECTION_ID, LINE_ID, ROLE_ID, POSITION_ID, EMAIL, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME FROM OPERATOR WHERE DELETE_FLG = 0 AND OPERATOR_ID <> 1 ORDER BY UPDATED_TIME DESC;

SELECT OPERATOR_ID, NAME, JOB_NO, WORK_COUNT_FLG, SECTION_NAME, LINE_NAME, ROLE_NAME, EMAIL, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME FROM V_OPERATOR_NAMED WHERE DELETE_FLG = 0 AND OPERATOR_ID <> 1 ORDER BY UPDATED_TIME DESC;

SELECT DISTINCT OPERATOR_ID, o.NAME, JOB_NO, WORK_COUNT_FLG, SECTION_NAME, LINE_NAME, ROLE_NAME, RANK_KIND, EMAIL, o.UPDATED_BY, o.UPDATED_TIME FROM V_OPERATOR_NAMED o join tools_manage tm on tm.responsible_operator_id=o.operator_id where o.DELETE_FLG = 0 and tm.status in(1,4) AND o.OPERATOR_ID <> 1 ORDER BY o.UPDATED_TIME DESC;

SELECT OPERATOR_ID, NAME, JOB_NO, SECTION_ID, LINE_ID, ROLE_ID, POSITION_ID, work_count_flg, SECTION_NAME, PROCESS_CODE, LINE_NAME, ROLE_NAME, POSITION_NAME, PWD_DATE, PX FROM V_OPERATOR_LOGIN WHERE DELETE_FLG = 0 AND JOB_NO = #{job_no} AND PWD = #{pwd};
SELECT PWD_DATE FROM OPERATOR WHERE DELETE_FLG = 0 AND OPERATOR_ID = #{operator_id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OPERATOR (NAME, JOB_NO, PWD, WORK_COUNT_FLG, SECTION_ID, LINE_ID, ROLE_ID, POSITION_ID, EMAIL, PX, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME) VALUES (#{name}, #{job_no}, #{pwd}, #{work_count_flg}, #{section_id}, #{line_id}, #{role_id}, #{position_id}, #{email}, #{px}, #{updated_by}, current_timestamp);
mapper.update: UPDATE OPERATOR SET DELETE_FLG = 1, UPDATED_BY = #{updated_by}, UPDATED_TIME = current_timestamp WHERE OPERATOR_ID = #{operator_id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ROLE_OF_OPERATOR (OPERATOR_ID, ROLE_ID, EXPIRATION) VALUES (#{operator_id}, #{role_id}, #{expiration});
mapper.select: SELECT `oa`.POSITION_ID, `p`.NAME, `p`.PROCESS_CODE, `p`.LINE_ID , `p`.LINE_NAME , `p`.light_division_flg FROM OPERATOR_ABILITIES `oa` JOIN V_POSITION `p` ON `oa`.POSITION_ID = `p`.POSITION_ID WHERE oa.OPERATOR_ID = #{operator_id} AND p.DELETE_FLG = 0 ORDER BY PROCESS_CODE ;

SELECT DISTINCT `p`.POSITION_ID, `p`.NAME, `p`.PROCESS_CODE, `p`.LINE_ID , `p`.LINE_NAME , `p`.light_division_flg FROM OPERATOR_ABILITIES `oa` JOIN position_group `pg` ON `pg`.SUB_POSITION_ID = `oa`.POSITION_ID JOIN V_POSITION `p` ON `pg`.GROUP_POSITION_ID = `p`.POSITION_ID WHERE oa.OPERATOR_ID = #{operator_id} AND p.DELETE_FLG = 0 ;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OPERATOR_ABILITIES (OPERATOR_ID, POSITION_ID, CHIEF) VALUES (#{operator_id}, #{position_id}, #{chief});
mapper.select: SELECT OPERATOR_ID, NAME, ROLE_NAME FROM V_OPERATOR_NAMED WHERE DELETE_FLG = 0 AND OPERATOR_ID <> 1 AND ROLE_ID IN (4, 5, 9) ORDER BY ROLE_ID DESC;

select op.operator_id, op.name, ro.name as role_name from operator op join role ro ON op.role_id = ro.role_id join privacy_of_role pr ON ro.role_id = pr.role_id join privacy priv ON pr.privacy_id = priv.privacy_id where op.delete_flg = 0 and priv.privacy_id = #{privacy_id} union select distinct op.operator_id, op.name,ro.name as role_name from operator op join role_of_operator roo ON roo.operator_id = op.operator_id join role ro ON roo.role_id = ro.role_id join privacy_of_role pr ON ro.role_id = pr.role_id join privacy priv ON pr.privacy_id = priv.privacy_id where op.delete_flg = 0 and priv.privacy_id = #{privacy_id}
order by role_name

select priv.privacy_id from operator op join role ro ON op.role_id = ro.role_id join privacy_of_role pr ON ro.role_id = pr.role_id join privacy priv ON pr.privacy_id = priv.privacy_id where op.operator_id = #{operator_id} and ro.delete_flg = 0 union select distinct priv.privacy_id from operator op join role_of_operator roo ON roo.operator_id = op.operator_id join role ro ON roo.role_id = ro.role_id join privacy_of_role pr ON ro.role_id = pr.role_id join privacy priv ON pr.privacy_id = priv.privacy_id where op.operator_id = #{operator_id} and ro.delete_flg = 0
